title: Victoria sponge sandwich with vanilla icing, coconut and jam
ingredients: ['175g butter or margarine', '175g caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '175g self-raising flour', 'Filling', '50g butter', '75g icing sugar, sifted', 'a few drops vanilla extract', '4-5 tablespoons raspberry jam (or your favourite jam)', '4-5 tablespoons dessicated coconut', '4 glace cherries (optional)']
